name: twentyfour-hours-clock
description: A Web Component showing a 24h clock, build as Scalabale Vector Graphic (SVG). The hour hand does a complete circle every 24h (instead of 12h like on a regular watchface). If the clock is given geo coordinates it is also able to show day, night and twilight.
